it.polimi.se2019.model.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.player.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that manages all the information about the player during the game such as his character, his position, his score, the cards he holds, the number of deaths, the damage and the marks taken and his ammunition.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
